subject: Boston Marathon
Chicken Pox
lead_paragraph: A Boston Marathon tradition that brought Kenyan runners to a Hopkinton, Mass., elementary school had to be canceled this year when several pupils caught chicken pox. Kenyan runners have been visiting second and third graders at Elmwood Elementary School for the last 15 years. Rather than risk the health of the athletes, the event was canceled on the advice of marathon medical advisers and the state public health department.
